00049 void CMHostDlg::OnKillfocusHost() 
00050 {
00051 char   expts[MAX_EXPERIMENT][NAME_LENGTH];
00052 int    status, i;
00053 static BOOL bActive=FALSE;
00054         
00055   /* avoid recursive calls */
00056   if (bActive)
00057     return;
00058   bActive = TRUE;
00059 
00060   /* get list of experiments on host */
00061   UpdateData(TRUE);
00062 
00063   /* retrieve list of experiments and make selection */
00064   status = cm_list_experiments((char *) (LPCTSTR) m_strHostName, expts);
00065 
00066   if (status != CM_SUCCESS)
00067     {
00068     AfxMessageBox(CString("Cannot connect to host ")+m_strHostName);
00069     m_ListExperiment.ResetContent();
00070     m_ValidHost = FALSE;
00071     }
00072   else
00073     {
00074     m_ValidHost = TRUE;
00075 
00076     /* fill list box */
00077     m_ListExperiment.ResetContent();
00078     for (i=0 ; expts[i][0] ; i++)
00079       m_ListExperiment.AddString(expts[i]);
00080     }
00081 
00082   bActive = FALSE;
00083 }
00084 
00085 void CMHostDlg::OnOK() 
00086 {
00087   UpdateData(TRUE);
00088 
00089   if (m_ListExperiment.GetCount() == 0 ||
00090       (m_ListExperiment.GetCurSel() == LB_ERR && 
00091        m_ListExperiment.GetCount()>1))
00092     {
00093     /* if experiment list is missing or not selected get it */
00094     OnKillfocusHost();
00095     }
00096   else
00097     {
00098     /* set experiment and return */
00099     if (m_ListExperiment.GetCurSel() == LB_ERR)
00100       m_ListExperiment.GetText(0, m_strExperimentName);
00101     else
00102       m_ListExperiment.GetText(m_ListExperiment.GetCurSel(), m_strExperimentName);
00103 
00104                 CDialog::OnOK();
00105     }
00106 }
